I\'m Allergic I don\'t eat I\'m Allergic to I\'m not allergic to any type of food I\'m not picker with the food
Beefallergic Chicken Pork Fish Cheese Milk Pepper
Turn Serious Mode On :( Show help Dialog
To be able to show your Food Restrictions you have to configure it first How does it works? 1) You have to configure this application using the menu option \'My Restrictions\' to tell it which type of food you are allergic and which type of food you don\'t eat.\n\n 2) Next you will be able to choose in between a graphical version \'Show Icons\' or a text version \'Show texts\' to let people know more about your food restrictions. Do not show it again
Language to show What can you eat? Hi! I want to tell you that I\'m allergic to those types of food listed bellow. Be sure you are not using it on my food Hi! I want to tell you that I don\'t eat those types of food listed bellow. Be sure you are not using it on my food
No!! Come on!! Seriously? Why take life so serious? But OK. Let\'s turn this serious mode on :D Awesome :D. Life is too good. Let\'s have some fun :D
Vegetarian Vegan Cannibal Hi, I\'m vegetarian. I do not eat fish, seafood, poultry or any meat. Hi, I\'m vegan. I do not eat fish, seafood, poultry, meat or any animal products, including eggs, dairy and honey. Hi, I\'m a cannibal. I choose you to be my lunch today, would you like to follow me to the kitchen? image
